data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hlaváč, Peter, Lakota, Ján, Čeplík, Dávid (2016): Endogean and cavernicolous Coleoptera of the Balkans. XVII. A new species of the genus Speluncarius Reitter, 1886 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Harpalinae, Pterostichini) from Croatia. Zootaxa 4161 (1): 137-140, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4161.1.10|12 occurrences
